description: We are all used to the fact that in every country there is one special city, which is called the capital. But the centuries-old history and unique traditions of Uzbekistan do not allow us to single out just one region. And although the official capital of the Uzbek Republic is kind and hospitable Tashkent, we suggest you visit two other equally charming towns of the eastern state â€“ Bukhara and Samarkand. Long live Uzbek adventures!
title: Three Capitals Of Uzbekistan

description: You've probably heard more than once that Uzbekistan is one of the most ancient civilizations, keeping thousands of secrets of history and culture. Then where do you start exploring such an amazing country? From the "Four Pearls of Uzbekistan" tour!
title: Four Pearls Of Uzbekistan

description: A four-day cultural tour to sunny Uzbekistan will take you from a modern metropolis to the peaceful silence of Bukhara and Samarkand, to the fabulous world of cities considered the "eden" of the ancient East. You will get acquainted with the history of the emergence of these cities, which were the concentration of ancient science and culture in Central Asia.
title: Two Legends Of Uzbekistan
